description:
As a user
I want to verify the functionality of the CleverIT website
So that I can ensure it works correctly
name: CleverIT Page Test

steps.name: the homepage title should include "El talento excepcional se une a nuestra tecnología disruptiva"

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: expected 'YouTube' to include 'El talento excepcional se une a nuestra tecnología disruptiva'
    at Function.validateTittle (cypress/page_objects/ejemploFrontpage.page.js:28:15)
    at Context.eval (cypress/e2e/step_definitions/frontStepDefinitions.js:16:14)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: the homepage should contain the text "Home"
there should be a link to the Services page
I click on the link to the Services page

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 10000ms: Expected to find content: 'Servicios' but never did.
    at Function.clickPage (cypress/page_objects/ejemploFrontpage.page.js:42:7)
    at Context.eval (cypress/e2e/step_definitions/frontStepDefinitions.js:29:13)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: I should be redirected to the Services page
the Services page title should include "Servicios"
